original_text: There may not be any white hair and the mark may not be under the skin. The disease is leaving the person. Then the priest must keep him separate from the people for seven days.
korean_text: 그러나 제사장이 보기에 그 색점에 흰 털이 없으며 그 자리가 피부보다 얕지 아니하고 빛이 엷으면 그는 그를 이레 동안 가두어둘 것이며

sentences.original_text: There may not be any white hair
and the mark may not be under the skin
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 표시가 피부 밑에 있어서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: The disease is leaving the person
Then the priest must keep him separate
from the people for seven days
